meanings.definition: Relating to or having the properties of a cation.
meanings.sent1: The cationic solution attracted the negatively charged particles.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the cationic properties of the compound.
meanings.sent3: The cationic cat happily played with the anionic dog.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as cationic as the morning sun, bright and positive.
meanings.sent5: The cationic nature of the magnet made it stick to the fridge with ease.
